info.name: SteamTradies Black/Blue
info.description: Black/Blue skin for SteamTrades Requires Stylish, grab it here > Firefox - Chrome - Opera Important: read the notes for a description of each option! ↓↓↓ Select options below ↓↓↓
info.additionalInfo: --History-- 1.1.3 - smaller homepage search area; tweaked navigation buttons. 1.1.2 - bigger notification icon. 1.1.1 - fixed background in review replies. 1.1 - added option to change color (black or blue) 1.0 - released! ============================================================ --Options-- Color Scheme (default Blue) Changes steamtrades background to either blue or black and tweaks elements to match it.

options.label: Dark Blue
